item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>11tmr has been ok all week but tonight I have had to come via fcl - still some problems. Have a good weekend</p>
item.content:encoded: 11tmr has been ok all week but tonight I have had to come via fcl – still some problems. Have a good weekend

item.title: By: Matt
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: <p>Rich,</p><p>Thanks for that, not sure what happened there but after talking to the webmaster at the ISP of the people sitting on my domain it seems to have been sorted pretty quickly.</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Rich,

Thanks for that, not sure what happened there but after talking to the webmaster at the ISP of the people sitting on my domain it seems to have been sorted pretty quickly.

Matt

item.title: By: Richard Schwartz
item.dc:creator: Richard Schwartz
item.description: <p>11tmr.com seems to be working fine now.</p><p>-rich</p>
item.content:encoded:
11tmr.com seems to be working fine now.

-rich
